title: Ep 23: Leisure Time - Where Did it Go?
description: In this episode I discuss what it means to take a break and just be a person. I took 4 days off and realized that leisure time is something Americans hate. Why is that? Jean Baudrillard has some answers, as does Max Weber. Also, I read Dan Harris' book "10% Happier" about his journey into finding meditation. A great book for anyone deeply skeptical about the self-help guru world.
author: nadav@ymhstudios.com (Christina Pazsitzky)
